location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Extract of letter No. 72 from the Secretary to the Government in India

mods.abstract: Extract of the lettter in which the Governor General in Council ratifies the articles of agreements and approves of Colonel Pelly's proceedings with regard to the extension of the Mekran Line of Telegraph in Muscat and concurring with the Government of Bombay that Pelly deserves the commendation of the Government of India for the succesful termination of the negotiations.
